description: The tmnxL2tpPeerUnreachable notification is sent when
an L2TP peer becomes unreachable and when it becomes reachable again.
The value of tmnxL2tpPeerStatUnreachable indicates
if this peer is deemed unreachable.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpPeerStatUnreachable

description: The object tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription is a printable character
string.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription

description: The tmnxL2tpIsaMdaVRtrStateChange notification is sent when
the operational state of an L2TP ISA MDA with respect
to a Virtual Router changes.

Summary.eval: ($v2 ne '') ? '$v2' : 'Operational state of L2TP ISA MDA: $v1'

description: The value of tmnxL2tpIsaMdaVRtrOperState indicates the operational
state of this L2TP ISA MDA with respect to this Virtual Router.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpIsaMdaVRtrOperState

description: The object tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription is a printable character
string.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription

description: The tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSessionFailure notification is sent when
the system could not create a new session in the tmnxL2tpLnsSePppTable.

Summary.eval: ($v4 ne '') ? '$v4' : 'L2TP LNS SE PPP session failed'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSessionFailure TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId u 9999 TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf i 9999 TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName indicates the user name
learned during the PPP authentication phase.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId indicates the service ID of
the IES/VPRN service to which this session belongs.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf indicates the interface index
of the group-interface to which this session belongs.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf

description: The object tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription is a printable character
string.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription

description: The tmnxL2tpLnsPppNcpFailure notification indicates that
there is a NCP phase setup problem.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsPppNcpFailure TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId u 9999 TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf i 9999 TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpPppNcpFailureProtocol i 1 TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName indicates the user name
learned during the PPP authentication phase.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppPppUserName

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId indicates the service ID of
the IES/VPRN service to which this session belongs.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppSvcId

description: The value of tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf indicates the interface index
of the group-interface to which this session belongs.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpLnsSePppGrpIf

description: The value of tmnxL2tpPppNcpFailureProtocol indicates the
failing NCP protocol.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpPppNcpFailureProtocol

description: The object tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription is a printable character
string.
variables.name: TIMETRA-L2TP-MIB::tmnxL2tpNotifyDescription
